title: Incredibly well positioned boutique hotel - LIP 129
details: LIP-129 If you are searching for an exclusive villa rental, guest house, boutique hotel or bed and breakfast in the most exciting region of Sri Lanka, then this is the place for you! The property consists of 99 Perches, it is a unique villa complex composed of individual pavilions and a historic bungalow. 6 exquisitely appointed bedrooms with attached bathrooms, an office room, 2 car garages, dry room, massage room, fully fitted kitchen and many more special features complete this hotel. The building is focused around an infinity edge swimming pool which wraps around the living area and cascades towards a Lotus pond and the very tranquil and well-designed gardens. It is situated only three minute walk from the glistening waters and palm fringed beach of Unawatuna which is a popular and safe beach on the south west coast of Sri Lanka. Galle Fort is less than a 15 minute drive away and only 10 minutes’ drive to the Southern Expressway. Unawatuna with its bohemian vibe offers many wonderful restaurants and bars and shops and is within walking distance of this boutique hotel.
